segments.text: You went out on a date last night , didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did , but Linda stood me up . She didn't keep the date for the first time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you phone her for a date again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did phone her this morning , but she hung up on me . I think she is going to walk out on me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't jump to conclusions . Look at the bright side , try to make another date again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . Thanks for your advice .
segments.speaker: S2
